sources.title: The_Navy_Way_(1944)
sources.description: Another military themed movie, made during the 2nd World War, so it's a little on the "gung ho" side. This is a little different from the other copy that is available, here. The opening title music has been restored and the hiss, pop, crackle has been cleaned from the audio. There are a lot of familiar faces, including Robert Lowery, who would later play Bruce Wayne/Batman in the "Batman and Robin" serial (1949).

sources.title: Navy Way, The
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Navy Way (1944) WORLD WAR II
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Lowery, Jean Parker, William Henry
 Director: William Berke
 Writer: Maxwell Shane

 The experiences of a disparate group of young men as they make their way through Navy boot camp.

metadata.Plot: The experiences of a disparate group of young men as they make their way through Navy boot camp.
metadata.Actors: Robert Lowery, Jean Parker, William Henry
